Text: After 4 hours the license key wore out - so I used the one from serial box - will tell you if that one runs out too...   :-(

this application guards your computer from the inside out.  I've been using it for years to keep my applications from talking to people behind my back.  I am amazed at how much communication goes on without the average user ever knowing about it.  I run plenty of cracked software but frankly I think it's unwise to use this without a legitimate license.  Don't try to cheat the people that have your back.

The SerialBox sn does NOT time out!! 

As for the last comment, I'll keep it in mind...
After unzip, error with message "broken or incomplete"
I agree with ninline, so I bought a license. Before that, I made it working longer using cron schedule service to stop and restart the little snitch service before it expires (4 hours).
